mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CoQnaBoard (co_email, co_title, content) VALUES (#{co_email}, #{co_title}, #{content})
INSERT INTO CoReCommentOfQnaBoard (co_email, co_coqb, content) VALUES (#{co_email}, #{co_coqb}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT co_moqb FROM CoMarkOfQnaBoard WHERE co_email=#{co_email} AND co_qnaId=#{co_qnaId}

SELECT cqb.co_qnaId AS 'co_qnaId', cu.co_nickname as 'co_nickname', cqb.co_email AS 'co_email', cqb.co_title AS 'co_title', cqb.content AS 'content', COUNT(clq.co_qnaId) AS 'co_likeCount', ( SELECT COUNT( ccoqb.co_qnaId) as cnt FROM CoCommentOfQnaBoard as ccoqb WHERE ccoqb.co_qnaId = cqb.co_qnaId ) + ( SELECT COUNT(crcoqb.co_coqb) as cnt FROM CoReCommentOfQnaBoard as crcoqb LEFT JOIN ( SELECT co_coqb, co_qnaId FROM CoCommentOfQnaBoard ) ccoqb ON ccoqb.co_coqb = crcoqb.co_coqb WHERE ccoqb.co_qnaId = cqb.co_qnaId ) AS 'co_commentCount', if(cmoqb.co_moqb, 1, 0) as 'co_markCount', cqb.createdAt, cqb.updatedAt FROM CoMarkOfQnaBoard cmoqb JOIN CoQnaBoard cqb ON cqb.co_qnaId = cmoqb.co_qnaId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT co_qnaId FROM CoCommentOfQnaBoard ) as ccoqb ON ccoqb.co_qnaId = cqb.co_qnaId LEFT JOIN CoLikeOfQnaBoard AS clq ON clq.co_qnaId = cqb.co_qnaId LEFT JOIN CoUser cu ON cqb.co_email = cu.co_email WHERE cmoqb.co_email = #{co_email} GROUP BY cqb.co_QnaId, cqb.co_title, cmoqb.co_moqb, cqb.content, cqb.createdAt, cqb.updatedAt;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CoMarkOfQnaBoard WHERE co_email =#{co_email} AND co_qnaId = #{co_qnaId}
mapper.select: select ccoqb.co_coqb as 'co_coqb', ccoqb.co_qnaId as 'co_qnaId', ccoqb.co_email as 'co_email', cu.co_nickname as 'co_nickname', ccoqb.content as 'content', ccoqb.createdAt as 'createdAt' from CoCommentOfQnaBoard as ccoqb left join CoUser cu on ccoqb.co_email = cu.co_email where co_qnaId = #{co_qnaId}

select crcoqb.co_rcoqb as 'co_rcoqb', crcoqb.co_coqb as 'co_coqb', crcoqb.co_email as 'co_email', cu.co_nickname as 'co_nickname', crcoqb.content as 'content', crcoqb.createdAt as 'createdAt' from CoReCommentOfQnaBoard as crcoqb left join CoUser cu on crcoqb.co_email = cu.co_email where co_coqb = #{co_coqb}
mapper.delete: delete from CoQnaBoard where co_email = #{co_email} and co_qnaId = #{co_qnaId}
delete from CoCommentOfQnaBoard where co_email = #{co_email} and co_coqb = #{co_coqb}
delete from CoReCommentOfQnaBoard where co_email = #{co_email} and co_rcoqb = #{co_rcoqb}
delete from CoLikeOfQnaBoard where co_email = #{co_email} and co_qnaId = #{co_qnaId}
